PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1992-22781992-11-040,  ISTC,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 1992-2085 which authorized the EXPORT DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION to make a loan to the BANK OF CHINA in order to finance the purchase of equipment and services to be supplied by SNC-LAVALIN INTERNATIONAL INC. for the construction of a styrene monomer plant at the Panjin Natural Gas Chemical Plant.
Attachments
